group_description: Dragon Ransomware, is promising rapid and customizable ransomware operations for Windows systems. Key features include a compact 50KB file size, ultra-fast encryption speed, and a builder tool that allows users to personalize ransomware configurations. The tool will be available to the public once the team reaches 1,000 subscribers on their channel, signaling a potential rise in availability to threat actors.
